topics.body:
"@Zak_Inc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a29675636872754a000951#post_55a29675636872754a000951
I've become much more inactive on MCF after the death of the old "Go through the alphabet before someone posts a my little pony picture" thread and the godawful forum software update.
Seriously, with most other major UI changes on websites, I don't really think much of them after a while (even if I heavily oppose them at first), but it's been well over a year and I still prefer how it had been before.
Not to mention posting there is glitchy as FUCK for me.
